text:
Here are the lyrics to **"Waka Waka (This Time for Africa)"** by Shakira, the official song of the 2010 FIFA World Cup:

---

**Chorus:**
You're a good soldier
Choosing your battles
Pick yourself up
And dust yourself off
And back in the saddle
You're on the frontline
Everyone's watching
You know it's serious
We're getting closer
This isn't over

The pressure's on
You feel it
But you've got it all
Believe it

When you fall get up, oh oh
And if you fall get up, eh eh
Tsamina mina zangalewa
'Cause this is Africa

Tsamina mina, eh eh
Waka waka, eh eh
Tsamina mina zangalewa
This time for Africa

---

**Verse 1:**
Listen to your God
This is our motto
Your time to shine
Don't wait in line
Y vamos por todo

People are raising
Their expectations
Go on and feed them
This is your moment
No hesitation

Today's your day
I feel it
You paved the way
Believe it

If you get down get up, oh oh
When you get down get up, eh eh
Tsamina mina zangalewa
This time for Africa

---

**Chorus (repeats):**
Tsamina mina, eh eh
Waka waka, eh eh
Tsamina mina zangalewa
This time for Africa

---

Would you like the full lyrics including the bridge and additional verses, or is there a specific part you want to focus on?
